## Tier Selection

Select the appropriate review tier for this PR:

- [ ] **SHIP** - Documentation, config, experiments (no production code changes)
- [ ] **SHOW** - Standard features and bug fixes (24h async review)
- [ ] **ASK** - High-risk changes requiring synchronous review (4h response SLA)

> If you're unsure which tier applies, see [REVIEW_CHECKLISTS.md](./REVIEW_CHECKLISTS.md) for detailed criteria.
